subject: RE: Seniors Week
preview: Hi James, Ok sure, we have updated this, I'm not sure how it snuck in, apologies. I checked and no one has registered as yet.

full_threads.body:
Hi James, 

Ok sure, we have updated this, I'm not sure how it snuck in, apologies. I checked and no one has registered as yet.

Hi Heath

The copy on this page indicates it's full which I guess is just a mistake (maybe whomever sopied it from last years page).
Can you check and delete the copy? I believe no ones booked yet

https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/seniors-week-2019/


JAMES




From: Kris Lukjanenko
Sent: Thursday, 24 January 2019 9:34 AM
To: Volunteers <volunteers@thehills.nsw.gov.au>; James Croll <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>
Subject: RE: Seniors Week


Thanks Laura,

I don't believe the classes are full. I'll let James look into what's happening there.

Regards

Kris

From: Laura Blackburn [mailto:lblackburn@thehills.nsw.gov.au] On Behalf Of Volunteers
Sent: Thursday, 24 January 2019 9:32 AM
To: James Croll <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>; Kris Lukjanenko <Kris.Lukjanenko@lakeviewprivate.com.au>
Subject: RE: Seniors Week


Good Morning,

Thank you for the confirmation and details.
The events will be listed on our website as part of Seniors Week, I will submit these to the webmaster today.

Our promotion includes advertising in the Community E-newsletter. January's went out this week with some overall information on the NSW Seniors Festival with information to check back soon for more event details. I will be further discussing a Media strategy with our Media Team which will start following Australia Day.

I just wanted to check the registrations for your classes- the Hydrotherapy for Arthritis Treatment states the classes are already full, is this correct?

Thanks,

Laura Blackburn

Community, Economic Development and Venues Support Officer

+612 9843 0322 | lblackburn@thehills.nsw.gov.au

Administration Centre, 3 Columbia Court Norwest NSW 2153

PO Box 7064, NORWEST NSW 2153 | DX 9966 Norwest

www.thehills.nsw.gov.au

From: James Croll [mailto:James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au]
Sent: Wednesday, 23 January 2019 4:03 PM
To: Kris Lukjanenko; Volunteers
Subject: RE: Seniors Week


Hi Laura

Can I just check you're on track to promote the events shortly?
What date will you promote them?

Thanks again!
JAMES

From: Kris Lukjanenko
Sent: Wednesday, 23 January 2019 3:44 PM
To: Volunteers <volunteers@thehills.nsw.gov.au>; James Croll <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>
Subject: RE: Seniors Week


Hi Laura,

We will run the seniors week events as:

Hydrotherapy for arthritis 230-4pm on Tuesday the 19th of feb
Falls prevention 11 -1230pm on Wednesday the 20th of feb
Hydrotherapy for arthritis 230-4pm on Thursday the 21st of feb

Thanks


Kris Lukjanenko
Allied Health Manager
Lakeview Private Hospital|17-19 Solent Circuit Norwest NSW 2153
Tel: 02 8624 5000|Direct: 02 8711 0244
www.lakeviewprivate.com.au



From: Laura Blackburn [mailto:lblackburn@thehills.nsw.gov.au] On Behalf Of Volunteers
Sent: Thursday, 17 January 2019 11:59 AM
To: James Croll <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>; Kris Lukjanenko <Kris.Lukjanenko@lakeviewprivate.com.au>
Subject: RE: Seniors Week


Good Morning,

Just touching base regarding Seniors Week.
We discussed last year the confusion with dates and your scheduled workshops.
The dates confirmed for the NSW Seniors Festival are Wednesday 13 and Sunday 24 February 2019. If you wish to keep your workshops scheduled for March unfortunately we would not be able to advertise them with the Seniors Festival information but we can still advertise on Councils website.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Kind Regards,

Laura Blackburn

Community, Economic Development and Venues Support Officer

+612 9843 0322 | lblackburn@thehills.nsw.gov.au

Administration Centre, 3 Columbia Court Norwest NSW 2153

PO Box 7064, NORWEST NSW 2153 | DX 9966 Norwest

www.thehills.nsw.gov.au




From: James Croll [mailto:James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au]
Sent: Wednesday, 19 December 2018 11:25 AM
To: Volunteers; Kris Lukjanenko
Subject: RE: Seniors Week


Hi Laura

Here's a link to the details with some wonderful copy you can cut and paste as you wish.


https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/seniors-week-2019/





From: Laura Blackburn [mailto:lblackburn@thehills.nsw.gov.au] On Behalf Of Volunteers
Sent: Wednesday, 19 December 2018 9:49 AM
To: Kris Lukjanenko <Kris.Lukjanenko@lakeviewprivate.com.au>
Cc: James Croll <James.Croll@lakeviewprivate.com.au>
Subject: RE: Seniors Week


Good Morning Kris,

Thank you for your email.
We are in the process of finalising our Seniors Festival Calendar with the aim of advertising it mid-January.

I am aware James has touched base with one of my colleagues but unfortunately I don't have any specific details.
Details would include:
Name of workshop/ event - Two events as detailed above - FALLS - 11;00AM TO 12:30PM … ARTHRITIS - 2;30PM TO 4:00PM
Date and time - Dates and times detailed above and in the link
Location - Lakeview Private Hospital Rehab, Level 2, 17-19 Solent Circuit, Norwest, NSW 2153
Cost - FREE
Max number of attendees (for our reference) - 16 FOR THE FALLS EVENTS … 8 FOR THE ARTHRITIS
How to book - (02) 8711 0247 OR BOOK ONLINE https://lakeviewprivate.com.au/seniors-week-2019/


We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Kind Regards,

Laura Blackburn

Community, Economic Development and Venues Support Officer

+612 9843 0322 | lblackburn@thehills.nsw.gov.au

Administration Centre, 3 Columbia Court Norwest NSW 2153

PO Box 7064, NORWEST NSW 2153 | DX 9966 Norwest

www.thehills.nsw.gov.au

From: Kris Lukjanenko [mailto:KrisLukjanenko@hssaustralia.com.au]
Sent: Thursday, 6 December 2018 3:24 PM
To: Volunteers
Cc: Laura Blackburn; James Croll
Subject: RE: Seniors Week


Hi Lauren,

We are interested in running a similar program to this year with some arthritis and hydrotherapy education/classes as well as falls prevention. James our marketing manager has already had some contact with one of your colleagues.

I've cc'd James for any updates.

Let us know what you need at present or if you need a schedule by a certain date.

Regards


Kris Lukjanenko
Allied Health Manager
Lakeview Private Hospital|17-19 Solent Circuit Norwest NSW 2153
Tel: 02 8624 5000|Direct: 02 8711 0244
www.lakeviewprivate.com.au



From: Lauren Fearnley [mailto:LFearnley@thehills.nsw.gov.au] On Behalf Of Volunteers
Sent: Thursday, 6 December 2018 3:11 PM
To: Kris Lukjanenko <KrisLukjanenko@hssaustralia.com.au>
Cc: Laura Blackburn <lblackburn@thehills.nsw.gov.au>
Subject: Seniors Week


Hi Kris
We are currently working on our calendar of events for Seniors Festival 2019 and we were hoping HSS may want to coordinate an event as part of our Seniors Festival program? Is this something you may be interested in?
Thank you
Lauren

Lauren Fearnley

Community Devleopment Officer - Volunteers

61 2 98430516 | 0401 711 192 | LFearnley@thehills.nsw.gov.au

Administration Centre, 3 Columbia Court Norwest NSW 2153

PO Box 7064, NORWEST NSW 2153 | DX 9966 Norwest

www.thehills.nsw.gov.au
